verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֤א <WH4853> The burden דְבַר־ <WH1697> of the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַדְרָ֔ךְ <WH2317> of Hadrach וְדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <WH1834> and Damascus מְנֻחָת֑וֹ <WH4496> [shall be] the rest כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> [shall be] toward the LORD עֵ֣ין <WH5869> thereof when the eyes אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> of all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> as of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also חֲמָ֖ת <WH2574> And Hamath תִּגְבָּל־ <WH1379> also shall border בָּ֑הּ צֹ֣ר <WH6865> thereby Tyrus וְצִיד֔וֹן <WH6721> and Zidon כִּ֥י <WH3588> though חָֽכְמָ֖ה <WH2449> wise מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> though it be very

וַתִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> did build צֹ֛ר <WH6865> And Tyrus מָצ֖וֹר <WH4692> herself a strong hold לָ֑הּ וַתִּצְבָּר־ <WH6651> and heaped up כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> silver כֶּֽעָפָ֔ר <WH6083> as the dust וְחָר֖וּץ <WH2742> and fine gold כְּטִ֥יט <WH2916> as the mire חוּצֽוֹת׃ <WH2351> of the streets

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> Behold the Lord יֽוֹרִשֶׁ֔נָּה <WH3423> will cast her out וְהִכָּ֥ה <WH5221> and he will smite בַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> in the sea חֵילָ֑הּ <WH2428> her power וְהִ֖יא <WH1931> he בָּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> with fire תֵּאָכֵֽל׃ <WH398> and she shall be devoured

תֵּרֶ֨א <WH7200> shall see אַשְׁקְל֜וֹן <WH831> Ashkelon וְתִירָ֗א <WH3372> [it] and fear וְעַזָּה֙ <WH5804> Gaza וְתָחִ֣יל <WH2342> sorrowful מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> also [shall see it] and be very וְעֶקְר֖וֹן <WH6138> and Ekron כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֹבִ֣ישׁ <WH954> has been מֶבָּטָ֑הּ <WH4007> for her expectation וְאָ֤בַד <WH6> shall perish מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> and the king מֵֽעַזָּ֔ה <WH5804> from Gaza וְאַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <WH831> and Ashkelon לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> shall not be inhabited

וְיָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> shall dwell מַמְזֵ֖ר <WH4464> And a bastard בְּאַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <WH795> in Ashdod וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <WH3772> and I will cut off גְּא֥וֹן <WH1347> the pride פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַהֲסִרֹתִ֨י <WH5493> And I will take away דָמָ֜יו <WH1818> his blood מִפִּ֗יו <WH6310> out of his mouth וְשִׁקֻּצָיו֙ <WH8251> and his abominations מִבֵּ֣ין <WH996> between שִׁנָּ֔יו <WH8127> from between his teeth וְנִשְׁאַ֥ר <WH7604> but he that remaineth גַּם־ <WH1571> also ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֵֽאלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> even he [shall be] for our God וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> and be like כְּאַלֻּ֣ף <WH441> and he shall be as a governor בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> in Judah וְעֶקְר֖וֹן <WH6138> and Ekron כִּיבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> as a Jebusite

וְחָנִ֨יתִי <WH2583> And I will encamp לְבֵיתִ֤י <WH1004> about mine house מִצָּבָה֙ <WH4675> because of the army מֵעֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> because of him that passeth by וּמִשָּׁ֔ב <WH7725> and because of him that returneth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and no יַעֲבֹ֧ר <WH5674> shall pass through עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> over ע֖וֹד <WH5750> anymore נֹגֵ֑שׂ <WH5065> and no oppressor כִּ֥י <WH3588> For עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now רָאִ֥יתִי <WH7200> them any more for now have I seen בְעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> with mine eyes ס

גִּילִ֨י <WH1523> Rejoice מְאֹ֜ד <WH3966> greatly בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הָרִ֙יעִי֙ <WH7321> shout בַּ֣ת <WH1323> O daughter יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold מַלְכֵּךְ֙ <WH4428> behold thy King יָ֣בוֹא <WH935> cometh לָ֔ךְ צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> unto thee he [is] just וְנוֹשָׁ֖ע <WH3467> and having salvation ה֑וּא <WH1931> he עָנִי֙ <WH6041> lowly וְרֹכֵ֣ב <WH7392> and riding עַל־ <WH5921> on חֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> upon an ass וְעַל־ <WH5921> on עַ֖יִר <WH5895> and upon a colt בֶּן־ <WH1121> the foal אֲתֹנֽוֹת׃ <WH860> of an ass

וְהִכְרַתִּי־ <WH3772> And I will cut off רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> the chariot מֵאֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> from Ephraim וְסוּס֙ <WH5483> and the horse מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem וְנִכְרְתָה֙ <WH3772> shall be cut off קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> bow מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> and the battle וְדִבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> and he shall speak שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> peace לַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> unto the heathen וּמָשְׁלוֹ֙ <WH4915> and his dominion מִיָּ֣ם <WH3220> [shall be] from sea עַד־ <WH5704> against יָ֔ם <WH3220> [even] to sea וּמִנָּהָ֖ר <WH5104> and from the river עַד־ <WH5704> against אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> [even] to the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

גַּם־ <WH1571> also אַ֣תְּ <WH859> you בְּדַם־ <WH1818> As for thee also by the blood בְּרִיתֵ֗ךְ <WH1285> of thy covenant שִׁלַּ֤חְתִּי <WH7971> I have sent forth אֲסִירַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH615> thy prisoners מִבּ֔וֹר <WH953> out of the pit אֵ֥ין <WH369> wherein no מַ֖יִם <WH4325> wherein [is] no water בּֽוֹ׃

שׁ֚וּבוּ <WH7725> Turn לְבִצָּר֔וֹן <WH1225> you to the strong hold אֲסִירֵ֖י <WH615> ye prisoners הַתִּקְוָ֑ה <WH8615> of hope גַּם־ <WH1571> very הַיּ֕וֹם <WH3117> even to day מַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> do I declare מִשְׁנֶ֖ה <WH4932> double אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> [that] I will render לָֽךְ׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for דָרַ֨כְתִּי <WH1869> When I have bent לִ֜י יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> Judah קֶ֚שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow מִלֵּ֣אתִי <WH4390> for me filled אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> with Ephraim וְעוֹרַרְתִּ֤י <WH5782> and raised up בָנַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1121> thy sons צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> O Zion עַל־ <WH5921> against בָּנַ֖יִךְ <WH1121> against thy sons יָוָ֑ן <WH3120> O Greece וְשַׂמְתִּ֖יךְ <WH7760> and made כְּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> thee as the sword גִּבּֽוֹר׃ <WH1368> of a mighty man

וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> over יֵֽרָאֶ֔ה <WH7200> shall be seen וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> shall go forth כַבָּרָ֖ק <WH1300> as the lightning חִצּ֑וֹ <WH2671> over them and his arrow וַֽאדֹנָ֤י <WH136> and the Lord יְהֹוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD בַּשּׁוֹפָ֣ר <WH7782> the trumpet יִתְקָ֔ע <WH8628> shall blow וְהָלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> and shall go בְּסַעֲר֥וֹת <WH5591> with whirlwinds תֵּימָֽן׃ <WH8486> of the south

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָאוֹת֮ <WH6635> of hosts יָגֵ֣ן <WH1598> shall defend עֲלֵיהֶם֒ <WH5921> and they וְאָכְל֗וּ <WH398> them and they shall devour וְכָֽבְשׁוּ֙ <WH3533> and subdue אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones קֶ֔לַע <WH7050> with sling וְשָׁת֥וּ <WH8354> and they shall drink הָמ֖וּ <WH1993> [and] make a noise כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> with יָ֑יִן <WH3196> as through wine וּמָֽלְאוּ֙ <WH4390> and they shall be filled כַּמִּזְרָ֔ק <WH4219> like bowls כְּזָוִיּ֖וֹת <WH2106> [and] as the corners מִזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> of the altar

וְֽהוֹשִׁיעָ֞ם <WH3467> shall save יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֛ם <WH430> their God בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> them in that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he כְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> as the flock עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> of his people כִּ֚י <WH3588> For אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> for they [shall be as] the stones נֵ֔זֶר <WH5145> of a crown מִֽתְנוֹסְס֖וֹת <WH5264> lifted up as an ensign עַל־ <WH5921> in אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH127> upon his land

כִּ֥י <WH3588> For מַה־ <WH4100> what טּוּב֖וֹ <WH2898> For how great [is] his goodness וּמַה־ <WH4100> what יָפְי֑וֹ <WH3308> and how great [is] his beauty דָּגָן֙ <WH1715> corn בַּֽחוּרִ֔ים <WH970> shall make the young men וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <WH8492> and new wine יְנוֹבֵ֥ב <WH5107> cheerful בְּתֻלֽוֹת׃ <WH1330> the maids
